original_text: And he answered and told them, Elias verily cometh first, and restoreth all things; and how it is written of the Son of man, that he must suffer many things, and be set at nought.
korean_text: 이르시되 엘리야가 과연 먼저 와서 모든 것을 회복하거니와 어찌 인자에 대하여 기록하기를 많은 고난을 받고 멸시를 당하리라 하였느냐

sentences.original_text: And he answered and told them
and how it is written of the Son of man
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 인자에 대해 기록된 것이 있으니

sentences.original_text: that he must suffer many things
